# Kubernetes Manifests

Generated by compose2k8s

## Generated Files

- `nginx-deployment.yaml` — Deployment for nginx
- `nginx-service.yaml` — Service for nginx
- `nginx-configmap-nginx-default-conf.yaml` — ConfigMap for nginx file: default.conf
- `api-deployment.yaml` — Deployment for api
- `api-service.yaml` — Service for api
- `api-configmap-env.yaml` — Environment ConfigMap for api
- `api-secret.yaml` — Secret for api (replace REPLACE_ME with real values)
- `postgres-statefulset.yaml` — StatefulSet for postgres
- `postgres-headless-service.yaml` — Headless Service for postgres StatefulSet
- `postgres-service.yaml` — Service for postgres
- `postgres-configmap-env.yaml` — Environment ConfigMap for postgres
- `postgres-secret.yaml` — Secret for postgres (replace REPLACE_ME with real values)
- `redis-statefulset.yaml` — StatefulSet for redis
- `redis-headless-service.yaml` — Headless Service for redis StatefulSet
- `redis-service.yaml` — Service for redis
- `ingress.yaml` — Ingress for routing external traffic

## Apply

```sh
kubectl create namespace fullstack --dry-run=client -o yaml | kubectl apply -f -
kubectl apply -f examples/04-fullstack/k8s/ -n fullstack
```

## Secrets

The following secrets contain `REPLACE_ME` placeholders that must be updated with real values before applying:

- `api-secret.yaml` — Secret for api (replace REPLACE_ME with real values)
- `postgres-secret.yaml` — Secret for postgres (replace REPLACE_ME with real values)

## Storage

Ensure your cluster has a default StorageClass or specify one in the PVC/StatefulSet manifests.
